experiences.title: Machine Learning Enginner
experiences.description: The training, part of the Digital Egypt Pioneers Initiative under the supervision of the Egyptian Ministry of Communications, focused on comprehensive learning and hands-on training in statistics, probability, machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), and generative adversarial networks (GANs). It also included using various Microsoft tools to enhance technical expertise and practical application.

projects.alt: Nail Diseases Detection Using Image Processing & Deep Learning
projects.title: Nail Diseases Detection Using Image Processing & Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a diagnostic system using CNN, VGG-19, and ResNet-50 (Acc: 89%) to detect nail diseases from 12,700 images. Integrated with Flask web interface.

projects.title: Quiz Online Website Application
projects.description: The Quiz application aims to deliver a smooth and interactive testing experience built entirely using Front-End technologies. It provides users with a structured and professional flow to navigate through questions, track remaining time, and view final results in a clear and engaging way.

projects.title: Bondi Website Application
projects.description: Bondi Website is a modern, responsive web template designed for a cafe or restaurant like Bondi, featuring an inviting aesthetic with sections for menus, reservations, and contact forms, optimized for seamless viewing across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Built using HTML5 for structure, CSS3 with Flexbox and Grid for flexible layouts, and Normalize.css for consistent styling, it incorporates interactive elements like smooth scrolling and hover effects to enhance user engagement.

projects.title: TO-DO List Application
projects.description: The To Do List App is a user-friendly task management tool developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It enables users to add, complete (via checkboxes), and delete tasks, with data saved persistently in the browser's local storage. The app boasts a clean interface featuring personal tabs, smooth animations, and efficient organization for daily activities.

projects.title: Sidebar Menu Template
projects.description: This project is a responsive web dashboard featuring a collapsible sidebar menu with navigation links, a search bar, and a dark mode toggle, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes mobile-friendly behavior with a hamburger menu to open/close the sidebar and a semi-transparent overlay to improve usability on smaller screens.

projects.title: Social Links Profile Card
projects.description: The 'Social Links Profile Card' project is a simple and attractive personal profile page designed to display a user's various social media account links. It features a responsive design that functions well across different screen sizes.

projects.title: RAG System – DEPI Chatbot
projects.description: Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system using LangChain, LLMs, and vector DB to answer DEPI initiative queries with contextual accuracy.

projects.title: Generate Caption of Image
projects.description: Image captioning system using vit-gpt2-image-captioning model with PyTorch, Transformers, and Streamlit GUI. Clean OOP architecture.

projects.title: Text Summarization Using NLP
projects.description: Dialogue summarization app using BART-SAMSum, PyTorch GPU acceleration, and Streamlit. Human-like summaries with OOP design.

projects.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed tweets using NLP, attention models, Pandas preprocessing, and advanced visualization for sentiment insights.

projects.title: Superstore Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.description: 26-question retail analysis using Pandas, NumPy, feature engineering, and visualization for business insights.

projects.title: Bitcoin Historical Data Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed 1M+ Bitcoin records using ML models, preprocessing, and pattern detection for investment signals.

projects.title: Clock Using Computer Vision
projects.description: Real-time analog clock rendered with OpenCV, NumPy, and Matplotlib. Dynamic hands and smooth updates.

projects.title: Kasper Website Application
projects.description: Kasper-Website is a modern, fully responsive template designed for creative agencies, personal portfolios, and businesses, featuring a clean structure and smooth performance across all devices. Built with HTML5 for structure, CSS3 (Flexbox & Grid) for styling, and Normalize.css for cross-browser consistency, it includes interactive navigation and mobile-first design.

projects.title: Leon Website Applicatoin
projects.description: Leon-Website is a modern, minimal, and responsive template designed for creative agencies, portfolios, and businesses, featuring a clean aesthetic, interactive navigation, and optimized performance across all devices. It leverages HTML5 for semantic structure, CSS3 with Flexbox and Grid for styling, Normalize.css for cross-browser consistency, Font Awesome for icons, and Google Fonts for typography.

projects.title: Web Scraping YallaKora
projects.description: Web-Scraping-YallaKora is a web scraping project focused on extracting live football match data from YallaKora, an Arabic sports website, to provide real-time updates on scores, fixtures, and team statistics for enthusiasts and developers. Built likely with Python and libraries such as BeautifulSoup or Scrapy for parsing HTML, it targets dynamic content from match pages and league tables, ensuring efficient data retrieval while respecting rate limits and site terms.
